content: repeat from * to end of round round 51 - *ssk k2tog p3 repeat from * to end of round round 52 - *k2 p3 repeat from * to end of round pattern and images © 2014 justina chong anitsuj@gmail com big fat cable hat / 4 round 53 - *k2tog bring yarn forward slip next stitch purl-wise p2tog pass slipped stitch over repeat from * to end of round round 54 - *k2tog repeat to end of round cut yarn tail and thread through remaining stitches finishing weave in ends block lightly and enjoy pattern and images © 2014 justina chong anitsuj@gmail com
